title: Problems in Biomed Engr
description: Biomedical engineering problems from industrial and clinical applications are addressed and solved in small groups using problem-based learning methodologies. Credit will not be awarded for both BMED 2250 and BMED 1300.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BMED 2210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
